PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-13412000-08-230INDUSTRY,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder (a) approving amendments to the Corporate Plan of the ENTERPRISE CAPE BRETON CORPORATION (ECBC) for the fiscal years 2000-2001 to 2004-2005 (b) authorizing ECBC to set up a wholly-owned subsidiary, (c) approving a restricted transaction - incorporation of a subsidiary and deeming it to be a "parent" Crown corporation for certain purposes, and (d) directing that the financial year of the subsidiary shall end on the 31st day of March.
Attachments
